original_text:
The Lord is God,
    and he has made his light to shine upon us.
Bind the festal sacrifice with cords,
    up to the horns of the altar!
korean_text: 여호와는 하나님이시라 그가 우리에게 빛을 비추셨으니 밧줄로 절기 제물을 제단 뿔에 맬지어다

sentences.original_text: and he has made his light to shine upon us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분께서는 그의 빛을 우리에게 비추셨다

sentences.original_text: Bind the festal sacrifice with cords
up to the horns of the altar
